item.description:
One of the events that we held last winter were bill review parties. We will continue to hold these parties until all of the 2009 bills are reviewed.

Based upon the experience from last year, these events will be limited in the number of participants therefore please RSVP. We will have other parties therefore if you cannot attend this one or if the RSVP limit is met, please check the calendar for the next event.

This event is scheduled for three hours, therefore please bring your favorite drink, snacks and a copy of the New Hampshire Constitution, if you have one. You do NOT need to bring a laptop to this event.

If you have not been trained to do bill reviews, you are welcome to RSVP, however it is strongly encouraged that you attend a bill review training session (check our calendar).

"Anyone who fights for the Future lives in it today." - Ayn Rand
item.name: NHLA Bill Review Party
